rule: If a build is seemingly abandoned, has no claims to it, and is not near another claim, you may claim/loot/destroy it. If it looks like it's part of a nearby Town, don't touch it!
reason: If you find a build that meets this criteria, along with our rule on paths/railways/etc., you are allowed to do those things. This is the only exception to the griefing rule. We allow this so that players can collect resources from abandoned builds/Towns if they would like.
